channel.title: ON RAIL CRASH
channel.description: As I'm going through some tunnels a loading phase begins as I enter the next area on the map bm_c2a2c. As soon as the loading is complete, my game crashes down and I have to ctrl+alt+dlt to exit the game. Does anyone have any suggestions on fixing this issue? Thanks, any help is appreciated.
